2. User Eligibility & Age Verification

2.1 Minimum Legal Betting Age

Users must meet the minimum legal betting age in their jurisdiction, which may be 18 or 21 depending on state or local laws. By registering for an account, you represent and warrant that you meet this minimum age requirement.

2.2 Verification via Third-Party Services

You agree to provide accurate personal information (e.g., name, date of birth, address, Social Security number) for identity verification. We may use third-party services, such as Firebase Storage, to store documents to allow us to confirm your age, identity, and other details. You authorize us to verify your information through these services which includes document verification.

3. Geolocation & State-by-State Restrictions

3.1 Permitted Jurisdictions

RL Bets is currently only available to Users physically located in U.S. states where online sports betting is legal. You agree not to access or place bets from any location outside these permitted jurisdictions.

3.2 Geolocation Checks

We use geolocation technologies—including Nominatim for reverse geocoding—to determine your approximate location. If we are unable to verify that you are within a permitted state, or if you appear to be located in a restricted area, you will be prevented from placing bets.

3.3 Compliance with Local Laws

You are responsible for ensuring that your use of the Platform complies with all applicable state and federal laws. We make no representations that the Service is available or appropriate in every jurisdiction.

4. Fictional Credits & Earned Credits

4.1 Credits (Purchased)

  • RL Bets uses a fictional currency called “Credits.”
  • Credits are purchased through Stripe using a valid credit or debit card.
  • Credits do not expire once purchased.
  • Credits cannot be refunded (unless required by law) or transferred between Users.

4.2 Earned Credits

“Earned Credits” are the amount of Credits won from successful wagers. Earned Credits are accumulated separately from the purchased Credits in your account and reflect your winnings.

4.3 No Transfers or Refunds

Credits are non-transferable between Users and non-redeemable for cash, except as part of a valid real-money payout described in these Terms.

5. Betting Mechanics & Winnings

5.1 Placing Bets

Users can view and participate in “Wagers” (e.g., “Team A will win this match”) by choosing Agree or Disagree and staking a chosen number of Credits.

There is no imposed maximum or minimum bet limit at this time, although we reserve the right to implement one if needed for regulatory or responsible-gaming reasons.

5.2 Odds & Payout Formulas

Payouts are determined by weighted formulas that factor in the total number of Credits staked on each side of the wager. All bets on RL Bets are “weighted” based on the total Credits staked on each side. Suppose:

  • Bet = the amount of Credits you stake.
  • A = the total Credits staked by everyone on the Agree side (excluding your own Bet if you are also on that side).
  • D = the total Credits staked by everyone on the Disagree side (excluding your own Bet if you are also on that side).

If You Bet on “Agree”
Potential Winnings = Bet + (D × Bet) / (Bet + D)

In other words, you receive your original Bet plus a share of the Disagree side’s total stake. The share is proportional to your Bet relative to the total Agree stake (including your Bet).

If You Bet on “Disagree”
Potential Winnings = Bet + (A × Bet) / (Bet + A)

Similarly, if you bet on Disagree, you receive your original Bet plus a share of the Agree side’s total stake, based on the ratio of your Bet to all other Disagree bets.

In both scenarios, your final winnings include your initial stake (if you win) plus the “weighted” portion of the opposing side’s total staked Credits. If you lose, you forfeit your Bet. We reserve the right to adjust or refine these formulas from time to time for fairness and operational reasons, and any such changes will be announced or reflected on the Platform.

5.3 Real-Money Payouts

Depending on the rules of a specific leaderboard period or promotion, Users may be eligible to receive real-money payouts if they top the leaderboards or meet specific criteria. Payouts are generally processed via PayPal, Venmo, or Cash App, but we reserve the right to designate a single or multiple payout method(s). You are solely responsible for reporting and paying any applicable taxes on your winnings.

5.4 Tie-Breakers

If two or more Users share the same Earned Credits total, tie-breaking may be decided by “seniority,” i.e., the earlier account creation date.

5.5 Final Scoreboard & RLCS Referee Confirmation

For wagers that depend on specific player or team statistics (e.g., Score, Goals, Assists, Shots, Saves, Demos), verification of these outcomes is based on the official scoreboard displayed at the conclusion of the match. If the scoreboard is not shown immediately or is otherwise unavailable at the end of a match, RL Bets reserves the right to delay settlement of any related wagers. In such cases, bets will not be paid out until one of the following conditions is met:

  • The final scoreboard is displayed in an accessible live stream, broadcast, or otherwise made publicly available at a later time, confirming the official result; or
  • The replay is uploaded and processed by an RLCS referee on ballchasing.com, confirming the final outcome.

This policy helps ensure the accuracy and fairness of wager settlements. RL Bets retains sole discretion to determine whether the final match result has been adequately verified, and we may void, delay, or otherwise adjust any wagers if contradictory or unreliable scoreboard data is discovered.

6. Leaderboards & Tie-Breakers

6.1 Leaderboard Display

The Platform may feature leaderboards that rank Users by their total Earned Credits over specific timeframes. Leaderboard standings are determined solely by Earned Credits and displayed in real-time or near real-time.

6.2 Tie-Breaker Rule

In the event of a tie in Earned Credits, seniority (the earlier account creation date) shall rank higher. If an exact tie remains, or if any other dispute arises, we will attempt to resolve it in good faith based on the information in our records.

7. Dispute Resolution & Arbitration Clause

7.1 Internal Dispute Resolution

If you have a dispute regarding a wager outcome, payout, or any other issue, please first contact us at support@rlbets.gg or through the contact method provided on the Platform. We will make reasonable efforts to investigate and address your concern promptly.

7.2 Arbitration Agreement

If any dispute remains unresolved, you agree to resolve the matter through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of a neutral arbitration forum in Missouri, unless otherwise required by law. By agreeing to arbitration, you waive the right to a trial by jury or to participate in class actions.

7.3 Governing Law & Venue

These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of Missouri, without regard to its conflict of laws principles. For disputes not subject to arbitration, you agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in Missouri.

8. Account Bans & Fraudulent Activity

You agree not to use RL Bets for any unlawful purpose, including but not limited to money laundering, collusion, or any activity intended to defraud us or other Users.

8.2 Investigation & Freezing of Accounts

8.3 Bans & Forfeiture
